zoBuffer.h File Reference

Ring byte buffer function library. More...

#include "zoTypes.h"

Go to the source code of this file.

Data Structures

struct  ZO_BUFFER
 Buffer type. More...

Defines

#define ZO_BUFFER_DEFAULTS   {0,0,0,0,0}
 Default ZO_BUFFER variable initializer.

Functions

bool zoBufferInit (ZO_BUFFER *p, u08 size)
 Initializes a ZO_BUFFER variable. Always initialize a buffer variable with this function before calling any other function.
void zoBufferPut (ZO_BUFFER *p, const u08 data)
 Stores a byte in the buffer. Check for a space in the buffer with zoBufferIsFull() function.
u08 zoBufferGet (ZO_BUFFER *p)
 Gets a byte from the buffer. Check if there are any data in the buffer with the zoBufferIsEmpty() function.
u08 zoBufferRead (ZO_BUFFER *p, u08 index)
 Reads a byte in the buffer at specific index. The zoBufferRead() function does not take the byte out of he buffer like the zoBufferGet() function does.
bool zoBufferIsEmpty (ZO_BUFFER *p)
 Checks if the buffer is empty.
bool zoBufferIsFull (ZO_BUFFER *p)
 Checks if the buffer is full.
void zoBufferFlush (ZO_BUFFER *p)
 Flushes the buffer. All data in the buffer are discarded.
void zoBufferPutIsr (ZO_BUFFER *p, const u08 data)
 Inline unprotected version of zoBufferPut() for use in ISRs.
u08 zoBufferGetIsr (ZO_BUFFER *p)
 Inline unprotected version of zoBufferGet() for use in ISRs.
u08 zoBufferReadIsr (ZO_BUFFER *p, u08 index)
 Inline unprotected version of zoBufferRead() for use in ISRs.

Detailed Description

Ring byte buffer function library.
